content: Good. Putting us back where it should have been in the first place to capture the real confessed killer OBL. I'm for it and lets get that SOB. Enough of this playing around. No I do not think this is political posturing on Obama's part, he wanted him from day 1. That is a campaign promise he can keep if he turns up the heat and the Reps can't fault him on this one. Something they failed at. The win in Afghanistan will be the capture of OBL. That is the only reason we were and are there. "http://apnews.myway.com/article/20090326/D975T99O1.html"

title: More US troops for Afghan war
